attributes.action: Ensure that no Ebacc exams are on the same day to give students the best chance.
attributes.additional_details:
15th May - French and Science.
17th May - Science and Computer Science.
22nd May - English Literature and Geography.
23rd May - Languages and Science.
5th June - English Language and Geography.
8th June - English Language and History.
11th June - Science and Geography.
attributes.background: In this summer's exam schedule, there are a number of days where high profile subjects are on the same day, which increases pressure on schools and students as these are subjects that must be acquired due to the progress 8 measure. My recommendation is that no two Ebacc exams are on the same day.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise isn't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

Decisions about the dates of exams are taken by exam boards, not by the UK Government or Parliament.
